author: Alastair Gale
title: Sexual-Harassment Probe Shakes Japan as Abeâ€™s Power Weakens
text:
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, reeling from record-low polls, suffered a new setback on the eve of a trip to the U.S., with the Finance Ministry opening an investigation into sexual-harassment allegations against a top official.
Mr. Abe is set to depart Tuesday for a summit meeting with President Donald Trump in Florida, but he faces a mounting challenge to remain in power past a party leadership election in September.
Allegations...
